description:
In the digital era, in addition to concepts of marketing, students should also get exposed to latest tools and techniques that successful firms use to market technology products. It should be supported by numbers. Therefore, the course will additionally emphasize on: 

1. Which tools and techniques work better with the target segment? What are the upcoming trends? 
2. How are these decisions made anchoring back to numbers?
title: Marketing of Technology Products in the Digital Era
